abstract: Minnesota dentist Walter Palmer, who is returning to work after month of hiding from harassment, contests claims surrounding killing of Cecil the lion by his hunting party; maintains his actions were legal, but expresses regret about his ignorance of animals' significance.
lead_paragraph: The dentist whose killing of Cecil the lion sparked an outcry disputed some accounts of the hunt and said he would be back to his Bloomington practice on Tuesday.

headline.main: Minnesota: Hunter Returning to Dental Practice
headline.print_headline: Minnesota: Hunter Returning to Dental Practice

snippet: The dentist whose killing of Cecil the lion sparked an outcry disputed some accounts of the hunt and said he would be back to his Bloomington practice on Tuesday.
